data.quote: Learn to be calm and you will always be happy.
data.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

data.quote: Have the courage to act instead of react.
data.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

data.quote: Unless you believe, you will not understand.
data.author: Augustine of Hippo

data.quote: Tomorrow hopes we have learned something rom yesterday.
data.author: John Wayne

data.quote: A contented mind is the greatest blessing a man can enjoy in this world.
data.author: Joseph Addison

data.quote: To climb steep hills requires slow pace at first.
data.author: William Shakespeare

data.quote: The impossible is often the untried.
data.author: Jim Goodwin

data.quote: Life is not measured by the number of breaths we take, but by the moments that take our breath away.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: The less routine the more life.
data.author: Amos Bronson

data.quote: Nothing is impossible. Some things are just less likely than others.
data.author: Jonathan Winters

data.quote: To succeed, you have to believe in something with such a passion that it becomes a reality.
data.author: Anita Roddick

data.quote: You cannot avoid pain, but you can choose to overcome it.
data.author: Paulo Coelho

data.quote: Endurance is one of the most difficult disciplines, but it is to the one who endures that the final victory comes.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: You always make your own luck.
data.author: Navjot Singh Sidhu
